text: Asaperdina whiteheadi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Gressitt in 1940. It is known from China.BioLib.cz - Asaperdina whiteheadi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1940
title: Asaperdina whiteheadi
